pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:6.1: Ime kho panāyyāyo chasaṭṭhisatā pācittiyā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:7.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:7.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena upāsakena bhikkhunisaṃgho lasuṇena pavārito hoti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:7.5: “sace bhikkhuniyo āgacchanti, ekamekāya bhikkhuniyā dvetayo bhaṇḍike dehī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:7.6: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṃ ussavo hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:7.13: Thullanandā bhikkhunī khettaṃ gantvā na mattaṃ jānitvā bahuṃ lasuṇaṃ harāpesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:7.15: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo na mattaṃ jānitvā bahuṃ lasuṇaṃ harāpessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:8.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tassa khettapālassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:8.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:8.3: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā na mattaṃ jānitvā bahuṃ lasuṇaṃ harāpessatī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:8.4: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī na mattaṃ jānitvā bahuṃ lasuṇaṃ harāpetī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:8.7: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī na mattaṃ jānitvā bahuṃ lasuṇaṃ harāpessati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:8.8: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:9.2: “Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa pajāpati ahosi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:9.5: Atha kho, bhikkhave, so brāhmaṇo kālaṃ katvā aññataraṃ haṃsayoniṃ upapajji.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:9.8: Atha kho, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī ‘ayaṃ haṃso amhākaṃ ekekaṃ pattaṃ detī’ti taṃ haṃsarājaṃ gahetvā nippattaṃ akāsi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:9.9: Tassa puna jāyamānā pattā setā sampajjiṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:9.10: Tadāpi, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī atilobhena suvaṇṇā parihīnā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:11.1: Atha kho bhagavā thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:11.2: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc1:13.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
